Wonderful Tall body car, very spacious, comfortable riding with the excellent steering wheel. Very rarely I will get trouble with my Santro xing. To date I haven't faced any problem and the car is 20 KM's/ Litre after completing 135000 KM's also. Wonderful car. Very easy to service and maintenance cost is Rupees One thousand only after every 5000 KM's running.

I have owned Santro Xing GLS for over 10 years and a running of over 70,000 kms. The car is reliable, comfortable for 4 passengers and doesn"t need much maintenance. Servicing once every 10k km keeps it running like a charm. Build quality is also good. It does lack modern features like rear parking camera, sensors and safety features like ABS, safety bags
